sentences: Sabir Mateen (born April 16, 1951) is a musician and composer from Philadelphia.
He started out playing rhythm and blues in the early 1970s which led him to the tenor saxophone chair of the Horace Tapscott Pan Afrikan Peoples Arkestra.
